Reviews.Title: Good Windows 8 Machine, Some Limitations
Reviews.Author: Dr. Johnson C. Philip "Author of over 100 boo...
Reviews.Content: I have been using Dell machines now for more than 14 years and each one of them has been a pleasure to use. It is the same in the present case also.The machine is sleek, robust and easy to use. Of course, laptops are increasingly coming without DVD drives and this one does not have one. It seems that they have some variations in this model and some of my friends were able to buy them with DVDs. Since this one on Amazon does not have a DVD player, you need to decide whether it would suit your purpose or not.Windows 8 might give some difficulty to new users, but that is more of a learning problem and less of a computer problem. Each version of Windows creates this kind of learning problem, and it is a bit higher with Windows 8 or 8.1 but you will love it once you start using it.The above said, everything else about this Laptop is highly commendable. The price is reasonable, and Dell takes warranties and services very seriously. So far I had to use it only on the laptop that I acquired 13 years ago where they promptly gave me a battery and then a CD drive replacement. I have never had to contact them for any other machine.I recommend this Laptop with the above caveats!

Reviews.Title: fit my budget
Reviews.Author: shawna
Reviews.Content: for the money, I don't think there is a better laptop on the market, for what they charge.  I did a lot of research online, went to a couple big box stores to see how they looked in person, then went back online to make my purchase.  I've had mine a couple months now, and am very pleased

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Diaz
Reviews.Content: to be honest I was really sketched out about buying a refurbished item but not that I bought this dell I couldn't be happier about it. it was priced right and I got a fast good looking laptop

Reviews.Title: Celeron Processor, No DVD driver built-in, quite expensive
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I found this laptop is weaker than Dell Inspiron i15RV-954BLK.This laptop only used Celeron Processor, which will be hotter and slower. Any way, you must buy external DVD driver for this one. This will increase your cost. However I found Dell Inspiron i15RV-954BLK as the better laptop with the same priceDell Inspiron i15RV-954BLK Specs:Intel Pentium-2127U Processor4 GB DDR3L SDRAM500 GB 5400 rpm Hard DriveDVD Driver Built-inYou can see that laptop here:http://www.amazon.com/Dell-Inspiron-15-6-Inch-Laptop-i15RV-954BLK/dp/B00HRLSSKO/ref=psdc1_t1_B00F4MEK6E_B00HRLSSKO?tag=fkaus-20

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: Jongbun Min
Reviews.Content: it`s good. and fast delivery too. and really good price. it just works fine. i am useing now  i am so glad i have a good deal thank u

Reviews.Title: No DVD Player
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This laptop does not have a DVD player. I will try to get one installed but there goes all of the savings. I have no other complaints and it seems to be very responsive.Jim Salih

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Mangesh
Reviews.Content: Web cam stopped working after 2 days. The Dell tech guys asked me to pay $80 to fix some issues with the registry which was causing this issue.

Reviews.Title: Serviceable Computer, Poor Operating System, But Beware No DVD
Reviews.Author: treecounter
Reviews.Content: This computer seems to have all the speed and storage capacity I need for photos, word processing, spreadsheets, and internet access. It doesn't have a DVD writer/player, which I was looking for, and ordered this by mistake. However, this was my error. It is quiet, and doesn't seem to get too hot.The biggest drawback to this computer is Windows 8, a real mess of an operating system. My advice: Either bite the bullet and get a Mac, or at least wait till Windows 9 comes out. This computer came with Windows 8, and it took me a couple of tries to get 8.1 loaded on it; at least it was a free upgrade. The Windows updater offered me a couple of "important updates," which I selected, but then one of them failed to install. That never happened on my Vista machine. The "apps" for Windows 8 either don't work or are really lame. I tried at least a half dozen clock apps before I found one that worked, and it looked like it was designed by a 14-year-old, really gaudy and cartoonish. It took several tries to find a calendar app that worked. Most of the news apps are pathetic or excessively intrusive, especially CNN, which demands access to your photos and videos (why? to steal them?).After a few weeks, I'm slowly learning to navigate around this dog's breakfast of an OS, but still find it really annoying and a big leap backwards from Windows 7 and even from Vista. Windows Photo Gallery came with Vista, and I was able to download Windows Live Photo Gallery for free. On Windows 8, Microsoft wants me to subscribe and pay a monthly fee just to get Windows Photo Gallery. What a ripoff!Initially I set up screen saver as a slide show of my pictures, and I set them to display in "classic" mode. Windows 8 displayed all my photos sideways or upside down. I changed the setting to "pan and zoom" and my photos were displayed OK, at first. Now, possibly after a recent update, they are all displayed out of focus. Thanks Microsoft!

Reviews.Title: No optical drive
Reviews.Author: David P. Smith
Reviews.Content: Read carefully!  "This laptop" doesn't have an optical drive. No CD or DVD.Very limited if you can't install software without external hardware.

Reviews.Title: Further purchase necessary
Reviews.Author: Frances A Fowler
Reviews.Content: Did not have a tray for downloading dvd or cd. Had to purchase that extra. Was not too happy with thisl

Reviews.Title: Timely shipping and innovative packaging!
Reviews.Author: Horsegalraye "horsegalraye"
Reviews.Content: It's a great machine...... even though I intensely dislike Windows 8!  No problems with the laptop computer or the shipper!

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It took me awhile to get used to this computer because I was using a ten old dell computer. I would say it is very good for the price. Very sturdy and great for a graduate student like myself. Would def recommend. Dell products don't disappoint.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Randy Lott
Reviews.Content: Works very good and my girlfriend loves it.  I bought for as a gift so she can do schoolwork at home

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron
Reviews.Author: Brandashia
Reviews.Content: I loved the laptop...the description wS accurate came BRAND NEW I'm not too happy with windows 8!its very new! :-)

Reviews.Title: It's what time?
Reviews.Author: Kathy Finfrock
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap machine. Time is an hour off. Daylight Savings hasn't kicked in for it yet. I've had it a week and the touch pad already looks worn and heavily used. I purchased it to use MS Word since Word for Mac doesn't do everything the pc version does. It works well enough. Internet surfing / email is adequate. I'm not sure when it plans to update to windows 8.1. It's going on its own schedule and I don't know how to change that.  I don't know if that is a pc problem or a user error. At the end of the day, it does the job it was purchased for. It's worth the $300 and better than a netbook.

Reviews.Title: love it  !!
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM E SULLIVAN
Reviews.Content: whats not to love? it is the greatest product !! you will love it and have no complaints at all!!

Reviews.Title: Winmdows 8
Reviews.Author: Anton Brok
Reviews.Content: I cannot judge the hardware, but the Windows 8 software is not logical and it seems to be made for children games.As it appears that all new microsoft computers are now loaded with Windows 8 I'll have to look for another computer like Apple.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: slow, glitches. as soon as I turned it on (after it taking 20 minutes to finally boot up) it just started glitching out, and to make it worse it's running windows 8. The most confusing os windows has made. returned the day after I received it.
